Case: Michael-Deshields-MVA-10-31-2025
Client: Michael Deshields

__CLIENT CONTACT__
__Details:__ DOA 10/31/25
Location: Algonquin pkwy
Details: doesn’t remember, was asleep, another car sideswiped them and they hit a tree

Driver: Angelina Summers

Michael Deshields
PH: 502-416-9040
DOB: 5/8/2002
SSN: 404-59-4906
5502 Branston Dr
Louisville, 40216

EMS to UofL Hospital

Injuries:
Left arm, shoulder, neck, chest, ribs, had a chest contusion from airbags. 

PIP: State Farm 
__Person Making Contact:__ Justin
__Date & Time__: November 03 2025
episodes.natural_language:
Case: Michael-Deshields-MVA-10-31-2025. Initial client contact on November 3, 2025 with Justin regarding a motor vehicle accident involving Michael Deshields. The incident occurred on October 31, 2025, on Algonquin pkwy. The notes indicate the client doesn’t remember the event and was asleep at the time; another car sideswiped them and they hit a tree. The other driver involved was Angelina Summers. EMS transported the client to UofL Hospital.

Michael Deshields is the client in this case. They can be reached at 502-416-9040. Their date of birth is May 8, 2002, and their SSN is 404-59-4906. They reside at 5502 Branston Dr, Louisville, KY 40216. The accident details note injuries to the left arm, left shoulder, neck, chest, and ribs, including a chest contusion from the airbags. Personal Injury Protection (PIP) coverage is through State Farm. The person making contact is Justin, and the date/time of contact is November 3, 2025.
episodes.author: Filevine Integration

about.relevance: personal injury protection coverage for medical bills

episodes.original_body:
Case: Michael-Deshields-MVA-10-31-2025
Client: Michael Deshields

Michael, It' s Justin from the Whaley Law Firm. This is the text only number I mentioned for your file. Send any photos of injuries here along with the police report number. If you need to call me my direct line is 502-357-9603
episodes.natural_language:
Initial client contact on October 31, 2025 with Michael Deshields regarding a motor vehicle accident. The caller identified himself as Justin from the Whaley Law Firm and stated that this is the text-only number he mentioned for the file.

He asked Michael to send any photos of injuries to that text-only number along with the police report number. He also provided his direct line, 502-357-9603, for any needed calls.
episodes.author: Justin Chumbley
